Name: The Earth
About: About: The Earth now inhabitable was about 4.5 million years old when it was thought to be a florishing and progressive planet with the blue oceans and green lands. However, about a 100 years ago due conflict amongst eachother a nuclear war broke out between what were known as countrties called America and China. Countries were mases surface area divided with lines known as borders which were patrolled by the humans of that country. The nuclear war produced so much dust and toxic particles which first blocked the access of light from the Sun which prevented growth of any form, starving the planet. Then every thing inside the planet became extremely radio active. This killed all forms of life on Earth. Some groups of humans managed to escape by sending ships into Space.
